author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Luminex Corp Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.07
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Luminex Corp:
* ORATION REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $79 MILLION TO $81 MILLION * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.20
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $310 MILLION TO $316 MILLION * Q4 CONSOLIDATED REVENUE WAS $78.2 MILLION AN INCREASE OF 8% COMPARED TO Q4 2016
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.09, REVENUE VIEW $77.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $80.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $310.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
